column4: I have problem with audio when am playing a movie. It disappears maybe 10 seconds and is working 45 sec. Then 10 seconds again and so on. I have had this problem before and I did something with ubuntu 7.10. Am currently using 8.04 alpha4. Please advice
I don't think its related to 8.04 because I have had this with ubuntu 7.10.
that doesn't change the fact that you are using an alpha release
